name: Compliance by Authority & Status
query:
SELECT
    cm.authority,
    fr.compliance_status,
    COUNT(fr.name) AS total
FROM `tabFactory Regulatory Register` fr
JOIN `tabCompliance Master` cm
    ON fr.compliance = cm.name
WHERE
    fr.category = 'Compliance'
    AND fr.docstatus = 1
    AND cm.authority IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    cm.authority,
    fr.compliance_status
ORDER BY
    cm.authority;
